titles.title: Peace Corps Act Amendments of 1987
A bill to reauthorize and expand appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989 to carry out the Peace Corps Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Peace Corps Act Amendment of 1987 - Amends the Peace Corps Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989 to carry out such Act.
